wait.description: Component wait state. When true component appears in grey color and doesn't respond on onClick event

TDate.description: Date editor with masked input and date value validation

invalid.name: shape
invalid.description: - Style for invalid component state. Contains all listed above fields:

value.description:
Component initial value. "value" should be native avaScript "Date" object or date in iso format like
"YYYY-MM-DD"

name.description:
Any component name that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.name" field.
In addition component name can be used in global styles registered by "registerStyles" function to
associate particular style with this component

data.description: Any data that associated with component and returned in "onChange" event in "event.data" field

label.description: Label caption. Default is undefined and label is hidden

icon.description: Icon name to show. Default is undefined and icon is hidden

timeout.description: Represents timeout for "onChange" event in milliseconds. Default is "700"

empty.name: string
empty.description: - Empty char. If length of empty char is grate than 1 then only first character is used. Default is "_"

full.name: bool
full.description:
- If true then onChange event fires only if date is completely entered or completely cleared.
Default is "true"

type.name: enum
type.description: - Date format appeared in onChange event. Default is "iso" ("YYYY-MM-DD")

empty.description: Value appeared in onChange event then date is not completely entered or invalid. Default is "null"

required.description:
Indicates if necessary to change component color when entered date is invalid or incomplete.
Default is "true"

readOnly.description: Prevents from changing component value from user input, Default is "false"
